messages.title: It's Labour or the Tories
messages.content: This General Election is a choice between a Labour and Conservative government. The Lib Dems can't win nationally, and a vote for the Lib Dems in South Manchester will help the Tories to power.

messages.title: The Choice is Clear
messages.content: The Tories want a £200,000 tax giveaway for the richest estates, paid for by closing local Sure Start Children's centres.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour guarantees that you will see a local specialist within 2 weeks; the Tories would scrap this pledge.
Labour is delivering Metrolink to South Manchester; at risk under the Tories.
Action taken by the Labour Government has kept unemployment lower than in previous recessions under the Tories.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A vote for the Lib Dems in South Manchester will help the Tories to power.

issues.economy: The Tories want a £200,000 tax giveaway for the richest estates, paid for by closing local Sure Start Children's centres.
issues.education: The Tories want a £200,000 tax giveaway for the richest estates, paid for by closing local Sure Start Children's centres.
issues.health: Labour guarantees that you will see a local specialist within 2 weeks; the Tories would scrap this pledge.

leaflet.personalStatement: "Lucy grew up on my road and I've known her since she was a child. She went to school locally and lives in Withington with her family as I do. She works hard and knows the issues that matter to people." - Gilly Mehrban, resident and neighbour

endorsements.endorsement: Lucy Powell works hard and knows the issues that matter to people.

quotes.text: Only voting Labour can stop a Tory Government

leaflet.additionalNotes: Lucy Powell's pledges include honesty, hard work, standing up for our area, local, and making a difference.
